description: Beet root Vegetables peeled, sliced, and salted to perfection. This is no ordinary chip, Heaven and earth artisanal taro chips are an elevated taste experience. Heaven & Earth mission is to bring our consumers “better for you” food products with real ingredients that cater to the health conscious, as well as the regular Mom who wants to serve her children (as well as herself ☺) more wholesome products. H&E products are “All Natural” and will expand options for consumers looking to improve their healthy lifestyle. Looking forward to serve you a piece of Heaven and Earth! Cheers!
